layer at (0,0) size 800x87

    RenderBlock {div} at (0,16) size 800x55

          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 286x17
            text run at (0,0) width 286: "This text should turn green while it is active."
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
